title: Asian Stocks Climb With Metals as Volatility Eases: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks rose at the open on Tuesday, stabilizing after sharp swings in gold and silver sent ripples through markets, with the precious metals rebounding in early trading.
content: Asian stocks rose at the open on Tuesday, stabilizing after sharp swings in gold and silver sent ripples through markets, with the precious metals rebounding in early trading.
